document_data.name: Jessa Vai
document_data.mainbody: '''Jessa Vai''' was a officer within the [[Flaming Fist]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. For a brief time, she was assigned stationed in the town of [[Beregost]].
document_data.History:
In the [[1368 DR|Year of the Banner, 1368 DR]], Officer Vai was assigned to Beregost to deal with the bandits that were assaulting caravans and travelers along the [[Trade Way]]. She paid a 50 [[gp]] bounty for every bandit scalp that was brought to her during her stay. Vai specifically recruited [[Gorion's Ward]] to assist her with this endeavour.

Once the bandits were considered to have been dealt with, she returned to her superiors in Baldur's Gate and delivered her report on the situation.
